articles.title: Floyd Shivambu says EFF will oppose COP26 deal: ‘No American will build energy security in this country’ - TimesLIVE
articles.description: Shivambu said SA does not need the deal as it can explore other options to move towards cleaner means of energy without the involvement of international partners.

articles.title: Strong Solar Flare Could Trigger Auroras on Earth – In Time for Diwali in India - The Wire Science
articles.description: A strong solar flare erupted earlier this week that could affect GPS and communication satellites in the coming days, and also cause auroras in Europe and North America.
